message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I think it's a fantastic opportunity for you to get your hands on this amazing product. I'm willing to offer it to you for $9000.
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7500. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to make sure it's within my budget.

Thank you for your offer, Bob! I appreciate your interest in the product. After considering your proposal, I'm willing to make a counteroffer. I'm thinking of selling the product to you for $8500. It's a fair price considering the product's value to you, and I'm confident you'll find it a worthwhile investment.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $8000. I think that's a fair price for both of us.
